A frightening experience today was had after I had left my 5 year old son (almost 5 and a half) in the kids club, he returned back to our room on his own with no supervision - first shock to find him looking for our room. To get back to our room he had to walk past deep swimming pools, through a restaurant, and go up to the 3rd floor of lifts alone. I will say however the resort manager arranged to meet with us and has committed to taking actions to making Instant improvements. In addition to this , did his very best to accomodate us for the rest of our stay. The staff really are caring and concerned. Emilio thanks for your reply below - my son is not under 5, and your staff told me that 5 and above did not need parental supervision because they were supplying this. Iâ€™m not sure whether you noticed his age above. Thank you

The pool service was particularly disappointing. We ordered two pizzas with chili sauce but received only one. When we inquired about the missing pizza, the staff insisted we had only ordered one, providing no resolution to the situation. Additionally, the coffee service in the lobby lounge lacked consistency. One day we received coffee served with water, while the next morning, we were given only coffee at the same price. To add to our disappointment, when we ordered a croissant and sausages it arrived cold, not warm as expected. Furthermore, the behavior of the pool staff was rude when they asked us to leave while we were enjoying our late pizza. Understand the it is 7PM of closure time and we can feel how he rush to pull all the bed, but we are not in city hotel and we should be fine if we want to stay longer in the pool. There was no friendliness in assisting us with taking away the pizza. Considering the price we paid for our stay, this experience was far from worthy of a 5-star hotel. There are other meal options in Nusa Dua that offer better service and value. Also, the TV is oldiest, it is time to adapt with smart TV, event 5 star Kuta hotel has bigger TV than here.

My recent stay at this hotel was marred by a perplexing dining policy. Despite claiming unlimited dining, the establishment strictly monitored courses, charging extra for exceeding limits. Adding to the frustration, staff seemed unsure about inclusions, creating confusion for guests. This unexpected restriction and lack of clarity overshadowed the hotel's positive aspects. I do not recommend this hotel and won't be staying here again. If considering this hotel, beware of their unique approach to all-inclusive.

Place is a very convenient location with quite a few amenities nearby however further from the bigger malls and stuff Rooms are not maintained well, some showers donâ€™t have the hot and cold labelling Toilet has bidets but are barely or not working at all Layout of the hotel is a little confusing Pretty decent gym However would not recommend as many of the people didnâ€™t feel well after eating the breakfast at the hotel which means the hygiene and standards here have issues

Confusing pool etiquette. Asked to vacate pool chair because itâ€™s been reserved but then I canâ€™t put down my own reservation? And later I checked there is no reservation system but people can just leave their towels for an hour in a chair to â€œreserve themâ€. What happened is all these empty chairs with all with towels nobody uses for hours and guests just sit on whichever they want but I was the only one asked to leave. I was also the only local tourist so take from that what you willâ€¦ left a bad taste during the stay. Bathroom layout is inefficient and room acoustic is horrible.

TERRIBLE. You can hear every noise from the room next door. Took over an hour for dinner for one person. Overcharged me 100k rupia for a glass of wine. No private beach. Mosquitoes EVERYWHERE, wasnâ€™t a nice night for over $100 and worst hotel I have been to. Woke up to noise from next door at 4:00 am. Told management at 7:30 am, even showed them video. Asked for a refund and they just said sorry we canâ€™t control noise of people next door because they have children. Didnâ€™t offer a new room, didnâ€™t offer refund. Made me sit in the lobby where I was attacked by mosquitoes and then took my proof of overcharging me for wine and left. Absolutely TERRIBLE service. So disappointed. Do not stay here

Pictures are deceiving upon closer inspection not well maintained..ants..damp water by pool area...our room bathroom was clogging..toilet in both our rooms was blocked..had to stay an entire night with no toilet..was requested by manager to wipe feaces and throw tissue in bin ..don't flush in toilet...could not come show us how to use washer as he was busy (got everything on video) no room service offered for my breakfast but room service offered for everything else..no weight in lobby or hotel to weigh bags. Pathetic service more like a 3 star. Only located in a beautiful area all other respects I won't recommend for anyone..not even if they offered me it for Free

Staff was friendly, location was alright but the hygiene was terrible. The breakfast was unhygienic as there were so many flies in the cafe and in they landed on our food. The whole family had upset stomachs during the two nights at the hotel. The rooms were dirty with bedbugs the bites (were very itchy), and there was a cockroach in one of the rooms. The rooms also looked quite old and slightly dusty, but still acceptable. The worst was the food, I had diahrroea 5 times yesterday. The place was beautiful but I do not reccomend staying here if you want a pleasant vacation in Bali.

My stay at Marriott is utterly ridiculous so far! They call it five star resort but their service is only compatible with one star hotel. First we locked out of our room in the morning after coming back from breakfast for half an hour because the room key wasnâ€™t working hence missed an activity we wanted to do Secondly we left room at 10:30 and came back at 2:30 but the room wasnâ€™t clean. Then I tried to call reception for In-room dining I found the phone isnâ€™t working. I had to go to reception to place my order for inroom dining, asked them to fix the phone and put a housekeeping request. What a terrible day I had so far. Wish I could check out now and go to somewhere else but unfortunately I have to stay 3more days Being an ex Marriott employee I feel bad about the experience I have (I worked for Marriott international finance department in Australia)

Christmas dinner at the courtyard was one of the worst meals we have ever had. I had emailed them to confirm booking nearly one week prior, the communication was then via whatsapp. It took till Christmas day till they eventually sent correct payment link. The menu that was sent via text was not the menu given to us on the day. When I alerted a head employee to this,he took my mobile and then came back saying this was a mistake. He was very dismissive of the error and barely apologized. I sent a text to show what menu we had been given, eventually during the main course a member of staff came to apologize. He was very apologetic and offered more food/free bottle of wine. By this time neither of us what any other food from the restaurant and did not want alcohol.The main course consisted of over cooked King prawns, dry turkey and small lamb chops that I could not cut through never mind chew. We then waited nearly 30 minutes for a dessert, that was definitely not worth the wait. Truly terrible dinning experience here.

This was my first time staying at Courtyard by Marriott Bali Nusa Dua before I have stayed at a different hotel last time. I was really disappointed with the Customer Service and cleanliness at this hotel. The staff wasn't so friendly to the guest. Some of the staff were very rude to guest staying at the hotel. Especially at breakfast when you ask for something they would respond rudely to some guest. Sometimes they would forget to bring what you asked them for like napkins or coffee. Then I would have to ask again they didn't apologize for forgetting to bring what I asked for. The hotel was not very clean like the room, lobby, beach club. The room was not so clean like the floor was not clean it was pretty dirty and the bed sheet had some dark spots on them. When I booked the stay at the hotel on the website it didn't say anything about the renovation. The front desk never told me about the renovation. They only put a couple of guest on that floor were the renovation was going on. The staff was really loud in the early morning painting doing some construction in the rooms. Also, the beach club was very filthy the staff didn't clean up. The same trash was for a couple of days next to the beach lounge chairs. The beach was very dirty for the rest of my stay the staff never raked the beach. The other hotels would rake often the trash on the beach. I am very disappointed about this hotel. I have stayed before at Bali Nusa Dua with a different hotel and around the same price. I had better customer service and the hotel was very neat and clean. Also, the hotel was right on the beach the staff always cleaned the beach couple times a day. I will never stay at this hotel again next time I will stay at the other hotel. I have put this review on TripAdvisor they never posted the review on the website.

I was very disappointed during my stay at this hotel, and especially considering that it carries the Marriott name. This was the worse resort Iâ€™ve stayed at. After a long night of traveling, I was excited to go to the resort and sleep. As I arrived at the resort, the exterior of the resort is beautiful but donâ€™t let that fool you. The staff were also very nice and helpful. But I get to my hotel room, and notice that the room is not as glamorous. So clearly they take better care of the outside parts of the hotel and the lobby area than the rooms. The furniture in the rooms need a major upgrade. This resort is old and the furniture in the rooms definitely show how old it is!! And thereâ€™s a light above the door when you go into the room and unfortunately the light attracts a lot of bugs so there were mosquitoes in my room. The next day, I asked for a change of room, a room with better furniture and they said all the rooms were the same but they would give me another room. They gave me another room and itâ€™s bigger but the furniture is the same, old and outdated. But when I go into this room I notice little tiny bugs crawling on table, and at night when I was trying to go to bed after a rough day, (my atm card wasnâ€™t working in Bali), I noticed the same bugs crawling on the bed and on the pillows. SO DISGUSTING!! So I call the service desk and they gave me another room and it also had bugs by the bed so I say I donâ€™t want to stay at the resort anymore and got refunded and left.

Terrible service, no help at all. Rooms are logistically far from front desk and no help to deliver item to room, low star service quality, find another place worth your money. Room is closer to a oversized 3 star. Low quality. Bad Service. Shame. Change management asap or go broke.bad service with no effort, terrible hospitality.

Although the breakfast staff and housekeeping were very attentive, I wouldnâ€™t stay here again, I am very much dissapointed at this hotel. Their reception staff often miscommunicate, doesnâ€™t follow up or give the best effort to their guest. We had a group meeting and stayed for 3-4 days in this hotel. And so much mistake they made about our room bookings and their excuse was â€œThe hotel is in high season and we are occupiedâ€, made me question is this the kind of service a 4/5 star hotel would make? 1. Some of our guests were told the booking were only for 1 night when it is actually for 2 nights. No correction were made to the keys and they had to travel back and forth between room & reception just to get their access back. Believe me it is far and bothersome to do after a full day of work at 10pm when you expect to go inside and rest. 2. Our sales didnâ€™t inform our room requirement (connecting door) when we already request 3 days prior. The next day, when a connecting room was available, they tried to call our room but since we were at Bali for business meeting (not vacation), we werenâ€™t in our room and they decide to just give up and blame us for not answering the phone at our room. Why didnâ€™t they try to reach us by phone? What is the purpose we inform our phone number during check in? 3. We had a deposit at the hotel for about 9 Mio for the whole stay, but restaurant team on the first day didnâ€™t believe and tried to charge us. We had to over explain, about our deposit. A deposit is still money too! 4. We booked spa service for 1 person at 8am, and the spa approved for that. But when we call the reception to add 1 more booking, they inform that Spa opens at 10am and tried to decline our booking. We had to overly explain that we already got approved booking at 8am before.

Ini pengalaman staycation nyepi package tgl 2-4 maret 2022 (3hari2malam) dengan fasilitas dpt breakfast 3hari, dan dinner di hari ke 2. Breakfast cukup oke standard hotel2 lainnya. Dinner nya yg menyedihkan, knp saya blg menyedihkan, karena dlm package dapat free dinner, walaupun dengan menu ala kadar nya, sebetulnya its okey, TAPI gak di kasi MINUM DONKKK,,air puttih aja ga usa muluk2, ga disediakan, Melainkan disuru order terpisah dan itu disuruh BAYAR,which is itu adalah Equil. Ngelawak jg ini hotel,. Sebetulnya ga tega kasi 1 star, tp ya sudah lah, mreka juga tega ga kasi minum walau hanya air putih, pdhal package nya dinner,yg notabene harus nya include makan dan minuman (walau air putih). hahaha.. Padahal Hotel yang cukup menyenangkan dengan big pool.(cuma ini aja nilai + nya). Btw klo mau swimming pake lotion anti nyamuk yg tahan air, nyamuknya buanyakk, swimming sambil donor darah jadi nya (pool yg ada di foto). Kecuali swimming di area kolam arus,jakuzi (karena ada 2 area swimming pool ini yg saya maksud pool yg untuk fun2, bukan pool yg ada di foto), nyamuk nya agak dikit (masi ada) Kids club nya biasa aja.

Adding extra 1-night from the previous bookings. Paid a month prior to the bookings. BUT THE CARD KEY DISABLED for the extended night. Was put in building 5 that was far away from the lobby. A very unnecessary misunderstanding & miscommunications. Disappointing experience. The soundproofing of each room was very bad. Heard so many noises from other rooms. The room above us was so noisy, the steps was loud & they move around the furniture like crazy. Told the officer about this, but no follow-ups. As I write this review, the room above us still acting crazy.

This is the worst Kitchen of 5 star hotel I've ever stayed so far. The rice is stale, the porridge as well. I complained and they just sorry, but the worst was they kept serve it to all the hotel guest. I even ordered room service for a several time, and rice & porridge were always stale.

Catastrophe!! Very very slow service, hygiene level is not acceptable. Basin in the washroom got moldy never be cleaned away. Shower is also very dirty. Breakfast longgggg queue. However, staffs are very friendly. We did 4 nights booking there, but we stayed there only 2 nights then check out. Itâ€™s unbearable.

Bad hotel, the air conditioner didn't work well and when we asked to change the room they said there were no two adjacent rooms, after they made us wait for two hours for the air conditioner to be fixed, and when we came to borrow a bike to go to the restaurant they said we had to return it before 6 at night and the rest was less than an hour, they were not cooperative and our experience with them was bad.

Baru pertama kali pengalaman mandi di hotel pas badan udah basah kuyup dan lanjut mau ambil shower gel ternyata dispenser showernya kosong ( lupa di isi ) cukup bikin jengkel, udah lapor dan respon nya lama udah tunggu 15 menit masih belum datang isi, kamar 4214 kejadian jam 22.30 tgl. 2 juni 2023 booking name : kazue k.

We booked three rooms for three nights, two of the rooms pillows smell bad. When we call the night duty manager, her attitude is in unprofessional and not very helpful. Buffet Breakfast below most the three Star hotel in Bali. I don't recommend, unless you are happy with three stars standard.

Don't come to this place! The worse 5 star hotel from Bali! We stayed here 2 nights and both nights there were parties from 18 until 22... I didn't pay to listen to the music and not being able to sleep. I came to relax especially the next day I have a flight so how I'm supposed to sleep and relax? Very bad hotel!

sangat buruk, kamar yang diberikan sangat kotor dan banyak semut merah. ditempatkan persis di depan acara, dari jam 6 dan 10 malam 2 hari full acara dan sangat berisik, the worst hotel with this price in Bali!

I Will give it zero star if being allowed. Took them more than one hour to complete the check in registration with an excuse that the system is Down but they were able to check in other guests. What a joke of an hotel and a disgrace for Bali. Should avoid at all costs

security dan belboy kayak robot settingannya ga bener udah suruh Pak Grab lepas jacket dgn alasan ikutin aturan ya udah...masih kurang puas masih suruh tinggalkan jacket titip pada security, jacket tidak boleh dibawa...Pak Grab menjelaskan entar keburu makanan dingin, malah jawab bukan urusan kita...berlagu banget...masih suruh Pak Grab hapus rekaman video

Awful for 5 stars hotel. Wifi connection was way to slowwwwwwww!!! Fix it! Compare to cheaper hotel, this was unbearable. Breakfast was not great, not many food and drink options and tasteless. Staff service quality was also so so. Better find another 5 stars hotel in this area.

About the location. IT IS NOT A FRONT BEACH HOTEL. THE SHUTTLE ONLY ONCE AN HOUR. IT IS OFFTIME TOO. about the room is averagely small for a 5star hotel. REALLY MORE LIKE 3 STARS. THE SERVICE : 1. WORST HOTEL I EVER STAYED IN. THE RECEPTIONIST WHO SERVED US (BETTER NOT NAMED THE PERSON. AFRAID SHE GETS FIRED) 2. JUST TO DEFROST COLD FOODS WOULD BE CHARGED IDR 150.000++/ITEMS. SO SAY YOU HAVE 5 ITEMS, IMAGINE THAT. BIZZAARREEEğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡. NEVER HAPPENED IN MY WHOLE LIFE STAYING IN 5 STAR HOTELS WITH THESE KINDS OF REGULARITIES. 3. HAVE TO WAIT FOR THE MANAGER ON DUTY AFTER FINISHED MEETING IF WE HAVE SOMETHING TO SAY. 4. CUSTOMER IS NOT ALWAYS KING. BUT WE NEED A PROPER STANDARDIZED TREATMENT AS A CUSTOMER. BUT THIS SURE AIN'T THIS HOTEL SERVE CUSTOMERS. THIS HOTEL SPOILS MY MOOD OF VACATION. REALLY TERRIBLE GOODNESSğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡

Check in date can only be done by 4pm, while based on my experience the latest check in should be at 3pm (in various 5 star hotel) While check out hour is normal at 12pm. People from reservation desk inform the regulation of very late check in has been done by Marriot in may countries which their operate. Very disappointing service.

Tolong kasi tau staf sama security yang ada di lobby saya sebagai pekerja driver layanan onlin sangat tersinggung jika dia suruh melepas atribut saya ,saya tau aturan anda sebagai pekerja di sana tapi saya juga punya aturan untuk tetep memakai atribut sampai ketemu costumer, jika karyawan dan security hotel yang ada di lobby tidak terima dengan aturan saya atau kami sebagai driver layanan online silahkan kasih tau tamu anda supaya jangan memesan layanan kami atau suruh tamu hotel mencari kami atau saya keluar ,saya masuk karena ada intruksi untuk menemui atau menitip di lobby tapi kalian memandang saya seperti orang tidak punya aturan

At the check-in i was told ( after i gave passport and credit cars ) that we can order things on the room and pay at checkout; at the beach we were told that i did not create a deposit and have to pay; later at 22h i asked for a macaroon ( roughly 2h ) and 5min later someone knocked on the door with the bill and POS.. really? I was about to leave Bali with 2e debt?!
Horrible, 4.5mil for a 2 nights without breakfastâ€¦extremely expensive everything you want extra.

The room is not comfortable, because of the noise from outside and other room. The doors room disturb a lot. We can hear clearly everytime the neighbour closed the door or The bell ringing from other room. My child wake up easily during sleeping because the noise. Bad isolation.

The service was not as a 5 star hotel as titanium member I felt I didn't felt felt being honour, the breakfast is the worst, tasteless, not much option and we had to sit in the ballroom and I had to walk quite long distance to the Buffett station,this should be change and improved

Poor place, too many securities with almost military uniforms and they guard this hotel like a fortress, this is too much !! The management thinks that we are the guesses are threats to them. Better spend your money somewhere else for vacation.
Tempat nya sih enak tp sangat di sayang sekali banyak nyamuk nya dan semak semak yg bikin demam berdarah di karena kan terlalu banyak nyamuk demam berdarah nya jadi ngeri
Took a lot of time to deliver the food. Had to wait for 1 hr every single day during complimentary dinner time. Not recommended at all.

First.... if I talk about this hotel... i only can said silly... when i arrive that hotel, security was really not friendly... stop at the gate and after that they ask my name to driver... and 2nd..., I'm is one of dog lover... and that hotel are use the dog to check the car... and really... the dog is dont know how to do... i this is not K9 dog... really sad to seen the dog situation... thirsty and hungry... and because when i arrive is to late maybe the front dest staffs are sleepy... they not do services like usually... by the way... i just can say... thanks mike... i wont be there again... its suck
Security tidak ramah dengan memarahi driver online di hadapan tamu. Sepertinya ada monopoli transportasi tertentu di sini sehingga terkesan anti transportasi online.
Kamar nyaman, bersih , pelayanan baik . susunan nomer kamar agak acak . Tanya dulu ke resepsionos sebelum cari kamar ..
Key room maintenance could be improve please - room 5111 can't open and we info to roomboy but waited the engenering staff well done 30 minutes.
The hotel staff barged into our room without checking if we were dressed! We complained & they didn't care.
Tidak ada belboy bila check in tengah malam atau subuh.
The worst! ğŸ˜¡ found underwear behind the sheet. Should be from the previous guest. And the staff did not replace the sheet!
Nightmare! Very bad hospitality. And i had the worst view from my room, which is a parking lot. Thanks tho and happy new year.
Hotel sih lumayan bagus.,tp scurity nya sok jagoan!
Sekelas courtyard! reseptionist hari ini dihubungin puluhan kali,susah banget!
Here is not a hotel. The courtyard is far from the beach.
The beach is very dirty.. I'm very upset
tempatnya asyik, aman, tenang, dan cocok untuk berlibur...
Never come back to this hotel
Bad laundry services

Secara keseluruhan, stafnya ramah dan saya menghargai kesediaan mereka untuk memberi tahu saya jika ada masalah. Namun, saya mendapat peningkatan kamar dengan akses kolam renang. Saya tidak bisa membiarkan tirai terbuka karena khawatir ada orang yang lewat. Saya heran mengapa mereka tidak memperhatikan hal ini saat memesan kamar. Fasilitasnya agak kuno, beberapa kamar terasa agak ketinggalan zaman. Ada semut dan nyamuk di sekitar ketel di kamar saya. Yang paling parah adalah spa di lantai dua. Saya mencoba membeli gelang dan dupa di sana. Barang-barang itu ada label harganya. Saya diberitahu bahwa harga dupa sekitar 2.000 rupiah lebih mahal dari labelnya, dan awalnya diminta untuk membayar harga yang lebih tinggi. Harganya hanya sekitar 20 yen. Namun, saya terkejut mereka meminta pelanggan membayar untuk sesuatu yang tidak mereka lakukan, dan saya pikir itu tidak dapat diterima di tempat sekelas ini. Staf itu mengatakan kepada saya bahwa saya tidak perlu membeli apa pun lain kali, dan ketika saya bilang ingin membeli sesuatu, dia menawarkan untuk membayarnya sendiri. Saya bertanya apakah saya tidak menginginkan uang itu dan apakah itu aneh, tetapi dia hanya bilang akan memberi tahu bos, yang saat itu tidak ada di sana. Tentu saja, saya membayar sejumlah yang mereka minta. Keesokan harinya, ketika saya check out, mereka sepertinya sudah selesai membayar seolah-olah tidak terjadi apa-apa, jadi saya menceritakannya kepada staf. Saya juga menceritakan apa yang terjadi di spa. Saya bertanya apakah mereka tidak tahu karena saya sudah meninggalkan pesan agar mereka bisa membagikannya, tetapi mereka hanya meminta maaf dan mengatakan akan meneruskannya kepada bos mereka. Saya menerima email dari bos setelah saya check out, yang intinya mengatakan bahwa produk baru saja dikirim dan harganya belum ditentukan. Itu hanya alasan, dan saya kecewa karena mereka melakukannya dalam situasi yang tidak terorganisir dengan baik karena tahu pelanggan akan melihatnya. Saya minta maaf, tetapi jika sebuah spa mengiklankan dirinya sebagai spa mewah, perilaku seperti ini tidak pantas. Hotel ini adalah akhir yang sangat mengecewakan untuk perjalanan solo saya. Saya tidak akan pernah ke Nusa Dua lagi!

Saya tidak merekomendasikannya! Hotel ini menyesatkan tamu dengan menggunakan istilah all inclusive. Paket all inclusive yang dijual sebenarnya adalah paket makan yang buruk, terdiri dari makan siang dan makan malam yang dipilih dari menu yang buruk, ditambah minuman standar â€“ hati-hati, hanya ada satu bar. Saat memilih dari menu yang buruk, perhatikan detailnya, atau Anda akan terkejut dengan biaya tambahan untuk makanan tersebut, sementara Anda ditawari paket all inclusive. Hotel ini seharusnya dilarang menggunakan dan memasarkan paket makan all inclusive apa adanya. Ini sengaja menyesatkan. Saya tidak merekomendasikannya. Selain itu, pelayanannya lambat. Mereka lupa menerima pesanan. Mereka bekerja seolah-olah sedang dihukum. Ini bukan standar hotel bintang 5.

Tikus-tikus berlarian di langit-langit kamar. Kami meminta staf hotel untuk mengatasinya, tetapi mereka hanya memasang perangkap tikus lengket dan pergi. Air pancurannya kuning...kami tidak mengalami masalah ini di hotel lain. Sarapannya buruk â˜¹ï¸, semuanya makanan yang dipanaskan ulang; saya tidak merekomendasikan memesan tambahan. Namun, staf di ruang bermain anak-anak dan para musisi di pintu masuk sangat ramah. Terima kasih atas kebersamaan mereka; anak saya sangat senang.

Saya tidak merekomendasikannya, paket all-inclusive itu memalukan. Di satu bar, setengah menu tersedia dan Anda harus membayar sisanya. Di bar lain di hotel all-inclusive, mereka memberi Anda diskon 30% yang konyol untuk minuman dengan biaya tambahan seperti itu untuk paket all-inclusive. Mengingat ini hotel bintang 5, itu hanyalah penipuan. Sisanya tidak masalah.

Hotel yang bagus, sayangnya rusak karena akustik kamarnya... Anda bisa mendengar semuanya dan sulit tidur. Kami pernah pindah kamar, tapi sekarang anak-anak muda yang tidak menghormati tamu lain... kami akan memberi tahu petugas keamanan dan resepsionis dan melihat apakah kami perlu pindah kamar lagi. Sangat disayangkan untuk tempat seperti ini.

Selamat siang semuanya! Saya menginap di hotel ini dari tanggal 4 Februari 2023 hingga 7 Februari 2023. Kenapa saya menulis ulasan ini? Karena saya benar-benar takjub! Pertama, mereka mengabaikan saya. Pertama, di hotel ini, Anda akan menunggu selama kesabaran Anda memungkinkan. Saya menunggu selama 15 menit. Bar buka pukul 7 pagi, tetapi setelah pukul 8 malam, tidak ada seorang pun di konter. Anda akan terlihat oleh staf hotel di resepsionis, dan seorang anggota staf hotel yang duduk di meja berjarak 3 meter, tetapi sampai Anda mendekat, mereka hanya akan menatap Anda... Kedua, pagi hari dimulai dengan kopi.) Bagi saya, pagi hari dimulai dengan cangkir kotor dengan noda lipstik dan kopi yang dituangkan ke dalamnya, jadi kekurangan kayu manis untuk cappuccino saya hanyalah masalah sepele. â˜ï¸ Hotel ini akan dengan mudah mengganti cangkir Anda dengan cangkir yang sama kotornya. Butuh lima kali percobaan untuk menemukan cangkir yang bersih. Ketiga, ingin minum kopi di bar sambil menikmati pemandangan? Ini juga bisa jadi masalah, karena karyawan hotel pasti akan menyapu tepat di sebelah Anda, menimbulkan kepulan debu... Mungkin saya melewatkan sesuatu, tapi menurut saya ini hal-hal dasar yang perlu dipahami bahwa ini tidak normal.ğŸ¤”â˜ï¸ Keempat, antrean sarapan. Menurut saya, ketika hotel bintang lima sedang dibangun, seharusnya ada pemahaman tentang jumlah tamu yang akan ditampung, dan jumlah kursi di restoran harus sesuai... *Piring-piring di restoran juga kurang bersih. Kelima, layanan kamar. Setelah menginap di empat hotel sebelumnya, saya bisa memastikan bahwa semua staf layanan kamar selalu melepas sepatu sebelum memasuki kamar, tetapi ternyata tidak di semua tempat. Keenam, makanan layanan kamar. Sejujurnya, rasanya sama sekali tidak enak. â˜ï¸â˜ï¸ Ini pertama kalinya saya mencoba salad Caesar klasik tanpa ayam; sausnya sama sekali tidak mirip dengan Caesar. Ketujuh - rak pengering untuk cucian dan pakaian. Kepada para manajer hotel! Kamu tahu kan kalau liburan di tepi laut dan kolam renang berarti kamu butuh tempat untuk menjemur baju renang. ğŸ¤·ğŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ Tapi pertanyaannya di mana? Tidak ada tempat untuk menjemurnya, baik di kamar maupun di balkon. Begitulah keadaannya di kamarku. Kedelapan - lokasi. Ini bukan tepi pantai. Hotel ini menyediakan taksi per jam ke pantai. Kesembilan - biasanya hotel bintang 5 punya minibar, tapi hotel ini tidak. Kesepuluh - layanan kamar melalui aplikasi. Aku suka semua barang mudah dijangkau di kamar, seperti menu cetak, misalnya. Dan aku tidak mau membuang-buang ruang di ponselku untuk mengunduh aplikasi yang tidak kubutuhkan dan waktu untuk mendaftar.â˜ï¸ Semua ini terjadi dalam satu malam dan satu pagi di hotel... Semoga aku tidak terkejut lagi.ğŸ™ Kamarnya bersih, handuk, jubah mandi, dan sandal disediakan. Tidak ada mesin kopi. Kesimpulan: pada titik ini, hotel tersebut tidak memenuhi standar bintang 5 dan tidak memiliki kesamaan apa pun dengan hotel Marriott, meskipun terdapat kata itu dalam namanya!â˜ï¸

Kamar-kamarnya difoto dengan sangat baik... menipu. Malah, kamarnya dilengkapi dengan furnitur retro. Apartemen nenek saya lebih modern... kamar mandinya lumayan, tapi sistem ventilasinya akan bagus dan handuknya pun akan kering. Kami tidak merasakan kebersihan di restoran seperti yang diharapkan dari hotel bintang 5. Tidak sepadan dengan harganya. Anda mungkin membayar untuk nama Mariott, bukan untuk apa yang mereka tawarkan. Pusat kebugarannya lumayan, kolam renangnya lumayan, tapi tidak ada yang istimewa, hanya rata-rata. Kamarnya lembap. Pada hari terakhir kami hanya makan di restoran hotel, malam itu kami berdua jatuh sakit. Kami belum pernah mengalami masalah seperti ini di tempat lain di Bali. Ngomong-ngomong, stafnya sangat baik, kami tidak bisa berkata buruk tentang mereka. Tidak ada privasi di spa, semuanya terdengar. Ini sangat romantis setelah sakit perut ğŸ™ƒ Kami harus mengantre selama 20 menit untuk check out...

Pengalaman buruk bagi saya kali ini. Saat ini saya sedang di hotel, dan saya mendapatkan sarapan gratis dengan pemesanan. Saya memesan sarapan di kamar, dan tidak ada seorang pun di resepsionis yang memberi tahu saya bahwa jika memesan makanan, akan ada biaya tambahan dan Anda membayar penuh untuk sarapan. Tiba-tiba mereka membiarkan saya membayar sarapan lengkap meskipun gratis, tidak seperti beberapa hotel lain di Bali, mereka tidak mengambil keuntungan dari saya, terutama Ubud Visesa Resort Hotel. Saya sarankan Anda, saya pernah ke sana dan layanannya gratis.

Saya tidak merekomendasikannya. Sekilas, hotel ini tampak cukup bagus, nyaman, dan bersih. Setelah tiga hari menginap di hotel ini, yang tampaknya telah menetapkan status bintang 5 padahal seharusnya 3,5, kebersihan kamarnya, bisa dibilang, buruk sekali. Saya pindah kamar dua kali karena kebersihan dan serangga. HOTEL TUA YANG RUSAK
Mereka tidak mengembalikan uang deposit, dan Booking.com menutup komunikasi. Penipu.
Tua dan impersonal

On my last day things went downhill from a 4-star to a 2-star with the hassle during check out. They do not honor Platinum members when it is time to actually hold up their end of the benefits. I was nickle and dimed for a $10 Food & Beverage credit for a lunch revenue I would have otherwise foregone. In the same breath they want to sale you a buffet breakfast and dinner but can't handle something as simple as $10USD for a $400 stay. Priorities are out of order here. Same with late check out, at check in they do a whole spill about 4pm but at 12:45 are calling the room 15 minutes before my 1pm requested time.

Positive : hotel pools look big as we can also use the facility of adjacent Nusa Dua Garden hotel. Kids club staffs are very friendly. Negative : the room door does not have proper mechanism when being closed. Housekeeping staff would clean the rooms at nap time and just left the door close after they finished with disturbing braaaaakkkk sound. I complained on the first day, didnt get better on the 2nd and 3rd day. Had to complain again to the team. They gave me a fruit platter to apologize but please... better fix the door and at least train your housekeeping to do their job gently. Breakfast was so so like 4 star hotel. Not really lots of options. Update : on our last night at the hotel, they informed us we would get 1 hr spa for 2 persons. It s a nice gesture but unfortunately will not make me stay at the hotel for our next trip. Sorry...

Sleep is such an important part of a luxury holiday. Nice hotel but the rooms are joined by paper thin doors which enable them to be joined if you have both rooms. This also means you hear everything from a neighbour even when closed. You hear their conversation and every wardrobe opening and closing. Iâ€™m a deep sleeper and this startled me awake. Management werenâ€™t willing to move us to another room which made this a disappointing stay spoiled by something so easily fixed. Edit: suddenly they moved us. Not sure if it was the review or something else.

This hotel was a disappointment. I'm a Marriott Gold member and have stayed at many, many Marriott properties. I'll start with the good things about the hotel. The customer service tended to be friendly, nice, and welcoming. The front entrance and pool are quite grand and pretty to look at. Now for the not so good things: Our room had noticeable mold and dirt on the walls which was gross. The lighting in the room in general wasn't great and it was also very very cold in our room. The bellhop was very slow bringing our luggage to our room and we had to call multiple times for it to be brought. Also, the dining services were very slow as well and we waited for a long time to be served.

2 years ago = 2 stars. Year 2024 = still 2 stars. Housekeeping failed to pick my laundry though i already put in the laundry bag along with laundry sheets. Once i complained, they did not make it better by holding to their side of story. When i came to check in, there was a wedding and suprisingly held outdoor. To my concern that whether the rooms soundproof or not, front staffs assured me that their rooms are state of the art. And guess right, the next day the wedding continued to be held just by the pool in broad daylight! I could not sleep at all and continue to hear shouts and clapping. They offered a free transport to the airport to make it even. Good gesture but it was too late. Me as a Marriott Bonvoy Platinum Elite member DOES NOT recommend this hotel at all.

For a hotel that is supposed to be 5 stars, it has almost no benefits to its high price tag. Be prepared for no complimentary meals, no complimentary laundry service, early closing times for poolside service and bar. Pretty much every service outside of the basic room service has a high price tag. Our room was also quite small with the television being off center to the bed. No bath either. Its such a shame as the resort is very nice from the outside. Either be prepared to spend a lot more money outside of the booking fee's, do what we did and just eat outside of the resort for every meal (significantly cheaper) or stay somewhere else that has better benefits.
Not worth the price paid, rooms are small. Limited shuttle to beach

This establishment has exceeded expectations with cleanliness, service, location, food service etc etcâ€¦ The only aspect of disappointment has been that this establishment does not support video streaming, so whilst I can text and email on the in-house wifi, I am unable to access any video streaming platforms, which nearly prevented me from viewing my nanaâ€™s funeral which was live streamed. This caused great distress in the minutes leading up to the start of the service. I was fortunate that I had access to a personal phone that had data roamingâ€¦ but my anxiety experienced at this very sensitive time was unacceptable. An establishment that is apart of the Global Marriott network has greatly disappointed my expectations of service delivery in an area of modern technology that should be a basic requirement and service for a modern hotel.

Room is very old, you can tell from the rusty facilities, malfunctioning shower head, broken locker etc. There is no microwave oven in the room, they will charge you 150000 (~$10) for each use of microwave oven. They also don't have the charger converter which is very inconvenient.

Restaurant service is shocking! First night we waited over 20mins for a drink at the Happy Hour bar, level 1. They were not busy! Then went to the restaurant below the bar, and waited 1 hour for 1x entree of chicken satays and 1 x Indonesian main meal dish. There was only 1 x person working in the kitchen and very few people in restaurant. After we had waited 30 mins staff started to inform other guests there would be 1-1.5 hr wait for any meals as they had a big table of 20 people! The restaurant had hardly any people there! We tried the poolside restaurant the next day for drinks...hardly anyone was there...service slow but friendly. We are staying in Deluxe King room, overlooking the pool which is nice, but won't be dining in the hotel for any further meals! We'd planned to stay for 8 nights and really thinking of moving to another hotel!!! I notice a lot of positive reviews coming from local reviewers/guides!!!!

Their computer systems are terrible. No point in being a Marriott member if the computers barely work when they are supposed to add points to your membership. How can such a big company have this lame computerised membership system.

The hotel itself is very nice. Lacking the final half star in my opinion to make it a 5 star hotel. The pool and staff who were there were excellent. My gripe was with the check in. Very slow and considering I had snapped my Achillies and was in a moon boot there was at least 20 minutes until a wheelchair could be located. I was also located on a floor requiring a lift and in the middle of the corridor. Not ideal and the hotel was pretty empty I was expecting some consideration with my visible injury. At time when I needed the wheelchair it took another 20 minutes to come each time and I was only allowed to use it for 5 minutes. If this were truly a 5 star hotel there would have been more wheelchairs available and better understanding of there needs and timely services.
Inconvenient n very hot place. External spaces has no aircon with limited fans at open dining area . Reception area is very stuffy n humid . Limited food options.

Nice environment, staff friendly, but need to improve on the buffet breakfast serving. 1. Staff keep forgetting on our drink, until the Assistant Manage have to help us. Egg we ordered, all came wrong. (Dennish Tks) 2. Attach is the pic of the food left. 3. The sugar syrup taste better than carrot juice cos the carrot juice is mix with alot of water. Do take the syrup orange/apple juice. 4. Food quaility also need to improve. Visited a few Marriott breakfast place before, but need to improve.

Sangat tidak nyaman menginap di courtyard by marriot. Karena setiap tamu diharuskan melewati security check yang hanya berada di lobby, sedangkan parkiran kendaraan berada di area parkir yang berada satu tingkat dibawahnya. Dan tidak ada jalur khusus tamu menuju security ataupun elevator, jadi kita harus memutar sekitar 30-40 meter dan menanjak untuk menuju security check. Untuk ojek online pengantar makanan tidak diperbolehkan ke lobby, maka tamu yang memesan harus keluar ke portal check di depan signage hotel untuk mengambil pesanannya. Serta ruangan kamarnya tidak kedap suara, sehingga saat berada dikamar, kita sangat bisa mendengar suara tamu lain yang berjalan di gang kamar. Untung mereka memiliki kolam renang yang sangat luas serta kids club yang memiliki berbagai macam aktivitas.

Hotel lama, cukup terawat. Tapi lighting tdk cukup. Jadi tamu pun merasa tidak nyaman. Karena mau berlibur, bukan ke rumah horor. Breakfast standard. Varian tidak banyak. Sangat disayangkan, karena hotel menyandang nama besar Marriott, membuat expectation saya jadi meleset jauh.

I just check out today. Housekeeping great service mind. Counter staff so so, i lost my jacket cardigan in the private meeting room, during there is staff arrange chair. Until now No feedback, No follow up . Losing trust
Not near the beach, doesn't feel 5 star. thank God for the.wonderful hotel staff at the restaurant and pool bar.

Hotel yg cukup mewah dengan makanan yg berfariative dan enak.. seminggu menginap krn ada acara DEA, namun sayang Jas saya ketinggalan di kmr 5013 saat cek out 4 maret 2023. Saat ditanya ke recepsionist katanya ga ada.. berarti ada HK yg mengambil nya namun tdk diakui.. tolong kepada manager courtyard agar menseleksi lagi karyaman nya yg tdk amanah dan jujur.. semoga Jas saya bisa bermanfaat bagi yg memakai nya.. terima kasihğŸ™
Kamar bagus. Handuk Kotor ada rambut orang lain System penataan kamar berantakan (Saya datang untuk Acara Nikahan kenalan Saya)
Pelayanan ramah, fasilitas bagus, kolam bagus, sayang makan kurang enak dari mulai breakfast. Paket diner nyepi cuma kebagian ayam kecap + sayur toge, minum air putih doang.
Sorry for the not a good review, but not a 5 stars resort, location is the only good thing, they didnâ€™t guide me to my room after checking in, I had to look for it for at least 15 mins

1. Tempat tidur bayi (baby cord) nya jelas tidak terawat & berbau apek 2. Bantal2 ada dalam kamar sudah tidak layak dipakai utk hotel kualitas bintang 5 3. Sofa dalam kamar berdebu & berbau apek 4. Dudukan toilet kamar mandi longgar & karet2nya tidak terawat 5. Lemari cabinet dibawah televisi sudah aus sehingga selalu seret jika dibuka 6. Bathroom amenities terlalu sederhana utk kualitas bintang 5 7. Handuk sudah harus diganti krn sdh tipis & berbau apek 8. Kids menu perlu banyak sekali perbaikan dari sisi rasa & penampilan apalagi dg harga bintang 5 menjadi terlalu mahal 9. Kolam renang arus utk anak sangat baik & menghibur 10. Water gym seru & menghibur
After having a morning flight then stranded for almost 3 hours in hotel lobby, waiting for the rooms just to be cleaned was a horrific experience.
Izin tanya menunya sarapannya halal2 gak ya...?
We were at Momo for lunch. Best to avoid
pelayanan, suasana ,lokasi,dan tempat nyaman.
No yang dicantumkan ndak bisa dihubungi
Tolong hargai waktu orang lain.
N/A

Tersedia layanan bus antar-jemput. Sebelum menunggu, kami dengan sopan bertanya kepada staf di pintu di mana harus menunggu, dan mengikuti instruksi mereka. Namun, ketika bus tiba, mereka mempersilakan mereka yang datang terlambat untuk naik, lalu memberi tahu kami bahwa tidak ada kursi yang tersisa dan kami harus berjalan kaki atau menunggu satu jam lagi. Hal ini membuat kami merasa sangat tidak nyaman. Kami tidak tahu bahwa layanan bus antar-jemput berdasarkan siapa yang datang duluan, dan staf tersebut bahkan tidak meminta maaf. Hal ini membuat kami tidak ingin kembali lagi. Kamar yang kami tempati berbau tidak sedap, buku-buku di meja lusuh, dan bahkan telepon kamar pun rusak. Selain staf di pintu, staf lainnya semuanya tersenyum, dan Ibu Lin di meja resepsionis sangat membantu. Kami berterima kasih kepadanya karena telah mendengarkan penjelasan kami.

Saya ngeri dengan pantai pribadi hotel ini. Perjalanan ke sana memakan waktu sekitar 10 menit dengan shuttle, yang sebenarnya tidak menakutkan. TAPI, hanya ada sedikit kursi berjemur dan payung di pantai! Ketika kami bertanya tentang kursi berjemur tambahan, mereka menyuruh kami duduk dan menunggu seseorang mengosongkan kursi berjemur mereka. SANGAT disayangkan hotel seperti ini punya begitu banyak kursi berjemur dan payung! Setiap 3 menit di pantai, orang-orang akan menghampiri dan meminta Anda membeli pijat/suvenir/wisata. Airnya kotor, banyak sampah di tepi pantai.

Tidak pantas mendapat bintang 5, jauh dari itu! Saya sedang di sana dan sungguh mengecewakan! Saya datang dari resor bintang 4 di UBUD, jauh di depan! Kami memiliki 2 kamar yang bersebelahan, sayangnya tidak berkomunikasi, bahkan saat kedatangan, tidak ada nampan selamat datang meskipun kami tiba pukul 3 sore, piring tiba pukul 7 malam, salah satu kamar tidak memiliki air panas! Kolam renang terisi oleh handuk yang tidak terisi, saya tidak bisa membayangkannya di musim ramai! Saat sarapan, seorang badut memilih balon untuk diberikan secara eksklusif kepada anak-anak Asia! Anda tidak boleh membuat perbedaan etnis, itu tidak dapat diterima! Orang Eropa harus meminta untuk memilikinya! Saya sangat tidak merekomendasikannya kecuali Anda orang tua atau orang Asia, mereka adalah klien istimewa di sini!! Jangan pergi ke resor besar yang jauh dari bintang 5! Pantai, tiba dengan shuttle pukul 10 pagi dan sudah tidak ada payung lagi meskipun saya punya anak berusia 6 tahun dan baru akhir Desember... Bahkan untuk Malam Tahun Baru, tidak ada shuttle ke Bali Collection yang lebih lambat dari yang direncanakan! Di hotel, malam seharga â‚¬100, tanpa suasana dan makan di koridor, Bali Collection, hiburan yang luar biasa (DJ/DJ ğŸ· / pertunjukan api/kembang api...) gratis, kualitasnya luar biasa! Kembali ke hotel dengan Grab Di kolam renang, Anda meminta handuk, Anda harus menunggu 5 menit untuk mendapatkannya sementara yang lain mengambilnya di kamar mereka! Singkatnya, ini adalah detail yang saya jelaskan, jadi bayangkan... Saya tidak meminta apa pun dari manajemen hotel. Jadi pikir-pikir dulu sebelum memesan di sini, saya tidak percaya beberapa ulasan, meskipun itu sangat benar...

Sebenarnya, ini adalah hotel bintang 3 dengan harga yang sangat mahal. Jangan ulangi kesalahan kami; dengan harga ini, Anda akan menemukan hotel yang jauh lebih baik dengan area hijau yang indah, kolam renang yang bersih dan dalam, lokasi tepi laut, dan layanan yang lebih cepat dan berkualitas tinggi. Kami sama sekali tidak pilih-pilih hotel, jadi saya tidak pernah berpikir akan menulis ulasan buruk tentang hotel ini. Kami tertipu oleh peringkat Booking.com; mereka yang menulis ulasan bagus belum pernah ke hotel lain di Nusa Dua. Hotel ini berada di pantai kedua, dan check-in pukul 15.00 membutuhkan waktu yang sangat lama. Kami check-in terlambat setengah jam (pukul 15.30) karena mereka tidak punya waktu untuk membersihkan kamar. Mereka memang menawarkan pilihan minuman, tetapi ternyata mereka hanya memiliki jus semangka dan kelapa. Kami akhirnya memilih kelapa, yang kami tunggu selama 15 menit. Tidak ada lahan yang sebenarnya; semuanya ada di sekitar kolam renang. Ngomong-ngomong, kolam renangnya dangkal, kolam yang teduh kotor dan tidak nyaman untuk berenang, dan stafnya sangat lambat. Kami memesan kamar deluxe dengan pemandangan taman, tetapi mereka meng-upgrade kamar kami ke kamar dengan akses ke tempat parkir. Sarapan hotelnya sangat enak (dan seharusnya tidak ada yang lain, ini hotel bintang 5), tetapi itu tidak menutupi semua kekurangannya.

Kebisingan antar lantai, kedap suara buruk, sarapan buruk, dan pantai pribadi. Jaraknya sekitar 10-15 menit dengan mobil atau motor. Foto-foto di situs pemesanan hotel terlihat bagus dan ulasannya juga bagus, jadi saya menginap di sini, tapi ternyata tidak sebagus Novotel di sebelahnya. Untuk hotel di kompleks Nusa Dua, saya merekomendasikan hotel bujet dengan pantai pribadi! Saya tidak akan merekomendasikan hotel ini. ^^

Tempat ini cocok untuk keluarga. Ada kolam renang, pusat kebugaran, dan spa, dan Nusa Dua memiliki sistem keamanan sendiri, jadi aman. Namun, kondisi kamarnya buruk. Kecoak sering muncul, dan kurangnya sinar matahari membuat tempat tidur lembap. Secara pribadi, saya rasa saya tidak akan kembali lagi setelah melihat kecoak.

Beberapa staf tidak memberikan layanan yang layaknya Marriott. Antar-jemput ke pantai pribadi sangat panjang dan membosankan, dan waktu tunggunya juga lama. Kedap suaranya buruk. Sepertinya mereka mencoba menipu staf panti pijat, tetapi mereka tidak berniat melakukannya. Inilah mengapa saya mengurangi dua bintang.
Stafnya sangat tidak ramah dan lambat merespons. Nyamuknya banyak sekali. Anda hanya bisa melihat kolam renang lalu pergi.
Suasananya berisik karena kedap suara yang buruk. Hotelnya juga tampak agak tua. Makanannya tidak terlalu enak.
TV-nya sepertinya dari sekitar 20 tahun yang lalu. Fasilitasnya buruk.

We usually travel to Bali twice a year, and this time our stay at Courtyard left me with mixed feelingsâ€”half good (thanks to Gold Elite benefits) and half disappointing. Our stay was for 4 days and 3 nights but under two separate reservations, and we were told it would not be possible to stay in the same room. We would need to move on the second day. Fortunately, one very kind front desk staff member tried her best to reduce the inconvenience by upgrading us to a pool access room and allowing a late checkout at 1:30 PM on the last day. Although this was still slightly below my expectations, I appreciated her effort. The disappointing part was the room readiness on the last day. Since the hotel was fully booked, my husband suggested we return the keys before 12:00 noon so housekeeping could clean the room earlier for the next guest. Our plan was to have lunch by the pool and let our child swim, assuming our new room would be ready by then. Two hours later, my husband asked me to go get the keys. At 2:00 PM I went to the lobby, only to be told the room was still not ready but would be â€œsoon.â€ At 3:00 PM I went again and decided to sit in the lobby and wait, thinking it could not take much longerâ€”after all, normal check-in time for guests is 3:00 PM. By 3:25 PM, I had no choice but to insist on getting my luggage because my child had already been in the pool for three and a half hours and needed dry clothes. Luckily, I did, because it wasnâ€™t until 4:00 PM that I finally received the call that the room was ready. What I cannot accept is not just the delay itself, but the unclear communication. Every time I asked, I was told â€œsoon.â€ To me, that means 30 minutes at mostâ€”not another hour, and then another. In the end, half of our afternoon was wasted waiting (four and a half hours in total). If I had known from the beginning that it would take this long, I would not have returned the keys so earlyâ€”we could have stayed in our original room longer or arranged other activities. Having stayed with Accor and IHG before, I feel that Marriott provided the least clear communication in this regard, and that left me with a negative impression.
